email_body: Sounds good. This email address goes to my work. If you finish on Friday or over the weekend, please send to pallen70@hotmail.com Thanks, Phillip Allen -----Original Message----- From: "Tony Roberts" Sent: Wednesday, December 12, 2001 3:57 PM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: Comanch Trace Home Phillip, I will have the take off completed by Monday and will forward via email. Thanks, Tony Roberts
